items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and a great fit!
items.body: I was happy with my purchase, despite usually feeling nervous ordering women's clothing without trying it on first (since size and fit tend to vary greatly.) The fit of this garment seems more flexible, so I didn't have any issues when putting it on, and it seems other body types would not have difficulty fitting either. I like the fact that the straps are able to be adjusted to a reasonably short length. I've had issues with others, for example one from Victoria's secret, hanging far too low despite tightening the straps as much as possible. The fabric is stretchy to allow for comfort among different shapes and sizes, but the medium is still consistently loose on me. For reference, I am around 5ft 4in- 5ft 5in tall and usually weigh between 130 and 140 lbs, with a defined waist, somewhat large chest, but tend to carry any excess weight in my hips and thighs. I also prefer my clothing to be somewhat loose and baggy for comfort, and could likely fit into a small if I preferred a more form fitting garment. With my preferences, I typically would purchase a medium shirt or 6-8 in pants (the 8 often being baggy.) This medium size was consistent with most other women's clothing I have purchased in a medium (but not necessarily juniors.) The fabric is soft and the design is simple, yet attractive. My favorite detail is the lace up top, which accentuates a waist without being tight. I could wear this all day and never feel the need to pull or adjust. This garment is so comfortable I never actually notice it on me (like I would be forced to with stiff jeans, a tight waistband, or scratchy texture.) Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE it!
items.body: *** Update 4/6/16 *** I loved the green so much that I ordered another in baby blue. Sizing is consistent and I still love these nightie. However, the plastic strap adjuster on the green one snapped or something in the dryer and caused the entire strap to snap into pieces. I'm so sad! If I tried sewing the strap back together the strap would be completely disproportionate to the other and it just wouldn't fit right anymore. So, I recommend to wash these with delicates in a small load and tumble on low, or possibly even air dry even though it's a PITA. So far the blue one is holding up. I would keep in mind that the straps and the strap adjuster are delicate. I'm going to order another green one to replace the broken one. So sad. *** Omg, this is the cutest, softest nightie!! I bought the dark green in a size Large. It's fits me perfectly and is so cute and comfortable! For reference I'm 140 lbs, 34C. The green is more of a dark peacock green/teal than a dark forest green, so the color is a bit off from the picture. It's still such a beautiful color though! The lace is soft and stretchy, the straps are adjustable. I almost bought a Medium but I'm glad I opted for a Large just because it falls more loosely and doesn't hug my body too tightly, which is the way I wanted it to be. I absolutely love it. It's classy, but sexy and did I mention that it was crazy soft? Total win! I'd say if you want a tighter body hugging fit, order your normal size. If you want it to be a bit loose and flowy, order a size up! Read more
items.author: TickTockAlice

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a bit big, but luxurious fabric!
items.body: This was on the loose side. I got a medium since my waist is a 30, and my bust is 35/36, I also read in some of the reviews that I should size up. But it is probably 2 inches too big. I should have gotten a small. So other than being too big and not as fitted as I would like, the length is perfect, and the fabric is amazing! It is so soft and comfortable. I got the green one, and the color is lovely and right on. It appears to be well made. So all in all, it's a great nightgown, just don't size up: if you are right in the middle of sizes, get the smaller size, as it is stretchy. (unless you want it to be looser) Read more
items.author: Mama M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cute!
items.body: This is a lovely sleep garment- it is very soft and comfortable while being adorable and flirty. I wanted a nightgown that wasn't frumpy or hospital-gown like but that was still super comfy and cozy- and this fits the bill. I am 5 ft 3in and around 150ish lbs- big hips, big boobs. I got the large to err on the side of caution but it is a little big (mostly on the sides of the boobs- it kind of flares out). I could have gone with the medium because it does have adjustable straps. That said, it is totally fine as is and I love wearing it to bed! I haven't washed it yet so I can't speak about that. But I will probably air dry it and not risk putting it in the dryer. Read more
items.author: Brainstorm

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Snug compared to solid print versions
items.body: I’ve ordered this item in every color. The polka dot version is at least one whole size smaller than advertised. All the others fit perfectly, this one is a bit snug. However, the item is the same quality. And it’s soft, though not as soft as the solid print versions of the item. Read more
items.author: A. E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleepwear
items.body: I'm on my second one. So comfy and I like the fabric. Read more
items.author: Judy Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: These night gowns are so soft and comfortable to sleep in. I have purchased 2 so far and plan to get more. They are very cute and fit true to size as well. Read more
items.author: Jamie Alt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute nightgown, love it!
items.body: This nightgown is a must buy. I am super picky about my nightwear but is decent enough ti wear around your kids but cute little dress for thr hubs at the same time. I give a 10 on how comfortable it is. Every body type could pull it off. It is a little shirt thought if that bothers you, but for me it was an awesome buy and I already purchased 2 colors. Read more
items.author: Melinda C.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Mint Flower, Red, Blue Flower, Navy, Pink, Blue Floral, Blue Green, Black, Dog Footprints, Grey, Cherry Print. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
